Package Battleship.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
Battleship.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller class for a full game of Battleship.

This class controls the actual flow of the game. It receives input from the user, validates the input, uses the input to manipulate the Game model (assuming the input is valid), and then outputs the result to the user.

This class will also allow the project to be expanded to use different IO, along with adding a single-player (AI) option to the game in the future.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
0.2.1
Author:
Garrett Kamila Crayton
